unlimitedtrade.gui.title: Unlimited Trade Mod - %s
unlimitedtrade.config.openConfigGui.name: openConfigGui | Open Config GUI
unlimitedtrade.config.openConfigGui.comm: Set the hotkey to open the configuration interface
unlimitedtrade.config.startTrade.name: startTrade | Unlimited Trade
Configure actions to take after trading
When enabled, post-trade actions only apply to players on the whitelist
unlimitedtrade.config.waitProtoType.name: waitProtoType | Trade Protocol Mode
unlimitedtrade.config.waitProtoType.comm:
- If this mod is installed on the server, the private protocol will be used
- If ChunkDebug is installed, the ChunkDebug protocol will be used
- If neither is available, trade will proceed after a short delay
unlimitedtrade.config.dropBlockList.name: dropBlockList | Auto Drop Blacklist
unlimitedtrade.config.dropBlockList.comm: Limit item types for auto drop
unlimitedtrade.config.after_trade_action: Use/Interact with block and drop purchased item
carpet.rule.disableEndGatewayAnyTicket.n: Disable Entity End Gateway Chunk Loading
carpet.rule.disableEndGatewayAnyTicket.d: Disables chunk loading triggered when any entity teleports through an end gateway
carpet.rule.disableEndGatewayAnyTicket.e: Affects all entities (including mobs, items, and ender pearls) when teleporting
carpet.rule.disableEndGatewayPlayerTicke: Disable Player End Gateway Chunk Loading
Disables chunk loading triggered when a player teleports through an end gateway
Only affects players; target chunk will not be force-loaded
Does not affect other entities like mobs, items, or ender pearls
Helps restore old void trading mechanisms
Enable this rule along with enablePersistentTradingScreen to use old void trading
carpet.rule.enablePersistentTradingScree: Restores the behavior of keeping the trade screen open with unloaded villagers
When enabled, the trade screen stays open even if the villager's chunk is unloaded
Closes normally if the player dies or manually closes the screen
Supports the old void trading behavior
Enable this rule along with disableEndGatewayPlayerTicket to use old void trading
carpet.rule.enableUnlimitedTradeProtocol: Enables the Unlimited Trade protocol for extended trading features.
Allows custom trade logic beyond vanilla limits. May affect compatibility with vanilla clients.
